channel.title: Comments on: Rape Play Is Not Rape: Guest Post by Dr. Slut
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/rape-play-is-not-rape/#comment-673">The Slut</a>.
I'm an idiot. Forgot that you said you do rape play with safewords. So did I, back when my health was up to helpless struggles. Mea culpa.
I do still think it's subjective, and that you did a great job of pointing out the not-so-obvious way of looking at it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to The Slut.

I’m an idiot. Forgot that you said you do rape play with safewords. So did I, back when my health was up to helpless struggles. Mea culpa.

I do still think it’s subjective, and that you did a great job of pointing out the not-so-obvious way of looking at it.

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/rape-play-is-not-rape/#comment-673">The Slut</a>.
Um. Yikes. Well, I think anything without safewords is edge play for a lot of us. But I guess it is subjective.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to The Slut.

Um. Yikes. Well, I think anything without safewords is edge play for a lot of us. But I guess it is subjective.

item.title: By: The Slut
item.dc:creator: The Slut
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/rape-play-is-not-rape/#comment-652">Dirty Girl</a>.
Yes, my purpose was to explore whether rape play is really edge play or not.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dirty Girl.

Yes, my purpose was to explore whether rape play is really edge play or not.

item.title: By: Dumb Domme
item.dc:creator: Dumb Domme
item.content:encoded:
@Chrome (et. al.): What, exactly, is so well thought out? I have no fucking idea what the purpose or the argument is.

Is the author “educating” about rape play? or about herself? or just trying to convince us that it’s hot?

Lost.

item.title: By: chrome
item.dc:creator: chrome
item.description: well written and equally well thought out. brava!
item.content:encoded: well written and equally well thought out. brava!
